document.full_text: gold jumped to another record high on friday after the dollar fell to its lowest since late 2009 against a basket of major currencies, taking silver to a 31-year high, while inflation pressures in china also helped lift bullion's appeal.
document.title: gold hits record on weak dollar, china inflation data
lines_and_colors: gold jumped to another record high on friday after the dollar fell to its lowest since late 2009 against a basket of major currencies, taking silver to a 31-year high, while inflation pressures in china also helped lift bullion's appeal.
